location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch map of the Persian Gulf & Arabian Coast’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:430 x 465 mm, on sheet 493 x 527 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Harrison & Sons Lith. St. Martins Lane, W.C.Distinctive Features:Map issued as an Annex no. 5A to Anglo-Ottoman Convention of 29 July 1913 with roads and overland and submarine telegraph lines shown. Includes notations concerning topographic features.Signatures of Sir Edward Grey and Ibrahim Hakki Pasha within neat line it the bottom right-hand corner.
